EmailTemplate.name: EM-202308-EMP-HCT-SHRM-POST-EVENT-NURTURE.03 - Email #3 (Insights from the 2023
EmailTemplate.subject: Insights from the 2023 Virtual Care Transformation Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: WEBINAR Virtual Care Transformation Index Tuesday, September 19, 2023 12 p.m. Eastern Organizations recognize the power of virtual care and aspire to use it in a transformational way. In fact, based on our survey results, we expect to see 100% growth in the number of employers offering virtual-first health plans in the coming years. Join us <[[https://gateway.on24.com/wcc/eh/3511880/lp/4323417/new-research-5-ways-employers-can-put-healthcare-within-reach-of-all-employees?partnerref=tdh]]>as we share more insights from our survey of hundreds of U.S.-based employers, which examined the current and future state of virtual care transformation across organizations. - Hear insights from organizations at every stage in their virtual care journey - Learn about key challenges facing employers and how virtual care is addressing them Speaker: Kelly Bliss Kelly Bliss U.S. Group Health President Teladoc Health About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
